SEARCH
Package io.shiromi.saml.tools

Record Class Range

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
io.shiromi.saml.tools.Range
Record Components:
start - the start index of the match
end - the end index of the match
public record Range(int start, int end) extends Record
Instances of the record class Range store the range of a String match inside StringType, this class also is used heavily inside StringType.split(String, int), allowing splitting using a String delimiter.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shiromi
See Also:

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
